===Friendly Fracas===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Yun Jin)
:{{A|vo card yunjin invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' As it so happens, I'm free for a sparring match.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Yun Jin's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card yunjin ingame easy 02.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' Oh no, what did I do wrong?

;(When the player defeats two of Yun Jin's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card yunjin ingame easy 03.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' What a catastrophe...

;(When Yun Jin defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card yunjin ingame easy 01.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' Haha, first blood!

;(When Yun Jin uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card yunjin ingame easy 04.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' The next act begins!

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card yunjin invite easy 03.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' One step amiss and the show is over... How careless of me!

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card yunjin invite easy 02.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' Even though it's just a card game, to me it felt like a standoff between opposing armies. What a fine match it was!
{{Dialogue End}}
